# BNNSGraph.Error.unableToCreateContext

**Case**

The call to the underlying context-creation function failed.

## Declaration

```swift
case unableToCreateContext
```

## Error codes

- **BNNSGraph.Error.unableToCreateGraph**: The call to the underlying graph-creation function failed.
- **BNNSGraph.Error.unableToExecute**: The call to the underlying graph-execute function failed.
- **BNNSGraph.Error.unableToSetDynamicShapes**: The call to the underlying set dynamic shapes function failed.
